mission.label: Mission
mission.description: Offer people living with avoidant patterns a kinder way to challenge harsh thoughts.

whatIs.label: What it is:
whatIs.description: An evidence-informed cognitive restructuring companion that helps spot common thinking traps (catastrophizing, mind-reading, etc.) and offers kinder perspectives.

whatIsnt.label: What it isn't:
whatIsnt.description: not psychotherapy, medical advice, or a crisis service.

creator.title: About me
creator.content: I'm Carlos — this project collects and shares resources that might help people like me along the way.

thankYou.title: Thank You
thankYou.content: Thank you for trying re-frame. I hope it helps, even a little.
